description: üéµ[ALL IN ONE MUSICAL LEARNING SET] : This 14.5 inches wooden musical table has six percussion instruments including a cymbal, a wood tone block ,a 6 inch drum, a 5 inch drum and two wooden drumsticks. OATHX owns its design patent, Patent No.: US D984,525 S.

üéµ [KIDS SAFE MATERIALS]: The KIDS Drum Set is non-toxic and made of FSC certified natural wood. Each corner has adopted a rounded process and there will be no sharp or rough parts to hurt your baby's hands.

üéµ [PATENT ANIMAL SHAPE DESIGN]:The whole OATHX toddler Music drum set is a kitten shape design to attract kids .All instruments are removable ,and With 4 stabilizing legs ,the kids can play a tune or bang a rhythm with ease in their way .

üéµ [MONTESSORI TOYS FOR TODDLERS]: You will love this awesome Musical activity table that introduces little ones to the world of music! An super fun activities to help develop the child‚Äôs senses of rhythm and melody by listening to the natural sounds of wooden music kit .

üéµ [LEARNING & EDUCATION MUSICAL TOYS]: This Kids musical instrument set allows children to explore simple music concepts through creative play. Also it is a perfect birthday gift or Christmas gift choice for little drummer or children who are interested in music .
